title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.5 - Limit of on duty time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.5 - Limit of on duty time

State Regulations

When a driver of a motor truck and/or motor bus has been on
duty for 14 hours in any consecutive 24 hour period, which time on duty shall
include time for meals, even though part of such time shall be outside the

State of New York, he shall not continue or again go on duty without having at
least eight consecutive hours off duty. A release from duty of less than one
hour shall not be deemed to break the continuity of time on
duty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
175.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
